wikipedia_page.main: William Henry Samuel Jones (1876–1963) was a British author, translator, and academic.  He was known as Malaria Jones, because of his theory that malaria was instrumental in the downfall of the classical civilizations of Greece and Rome.

response: A history of the college was written by W. H. S. Jones in 1936.Jones 1936.
